price: 74. And they have taken besides Allâh âlihah (gods), hoping that they might be helped (by those so-called gods).
arabic: وَٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ءَالِهَةٗ لَّعَلَّهُمۡ يُنصَرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: wa-ittakhadhū min dūni al-lahi ālihatan laʿallahum yunṣarūna
